Test Case Procedure:
1. Create a request in Postman with POST method to https://localhost:5000/api/auth/register
2. Set request body as raw JSON:
{
  "email": "tenant@test.com",
  "password": "Password123!",
  "fullName": "Existing User",
  "phone": "0123456789"
}
3. Click Send
Expected Results:
Message contains "đã tồn tại"
Status = 400
Success = false
Pre-conditions: User with email tenant@test.com already exists and is activated

Test Case Procedure:
1. Create a request in Postman with POST method to https://localhost:5000/api/auth/verify-email
2. Set request body as raw JSON:
{
  "email": "pending2@test.com",
  "otp": "999999"
}
3. Click Send
Expected Results:
Message contains "không hợp lệ" or "sai" or "hết hạn"
Status = 400
Success = false
Pre-conditions: User has registered and received OTP via email
